**Irene Martini** (R&D and Technical Service, HQ – Italy)

- Projects: 2 (totaling 0.9 FTE)

**Marco Bianchi** (R&D and Technical Service, HQ – Italy)
- German skill: Level 2  
- Projects: 2 (totaling 0.9 FTE)
  - Lead on Cleanroom-compatible coating package (Helvetic FoodTech) - 0.5 FTE
  - Engineer on Fire-protection topcoat certification (Iberia Construction) - 0.4 FTE

Both have the minimum German skill level found in the company and the highest project workload among those employees.
